Copy these dirs:

* boost
    + boost asio library
* hiredis
    + git@github.com:wasppdotorg/hiredis-for-windows.git
    + rename to hiredis for "#include <hiredis/hiredis.h>"
* hiredis-boostasio-adapter
    + https://github.com/jinq0123/hiredis-boostasio-adapter.git
    + switch to branch jinq0123/master
